page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our area of study is predominantly rural.There are ten farms ranging in size from 14-400 acres.The area is sandwiched between the towns of{ {Runcorn}and{Warrington.Runcorn New {Town}is slowly encroaching from the West.Two thousand houses and a number of light industry factories are planned for the near future.This will change the nature of the area.There are two residential areas.The village of{Moore}with approximately 600 inhabitants and a small part of the village of{Walton}.There are a number of industrial concerns in the area.Some of these are service industries such as warehouse facilities and road haulage firms.There is one chemical works.The area is criss crossed by waterways and railways.Waterways include{R.Mersey, {Manchester Ship}and{Bridgewater}Canals
